Action Items:

  • Implement the new leadership and management training programs outlined in the Decide phase. Ensure that the training is accessible to all levels of leadership within the organization.
  • Launch the feedback and recognition framework for management. Communicate the framework clearly, and provide training sessions if necessary to ensure understanding and consistent application.
  • Initiate internal career advancement opportunities and kickstart cross-training and upskilling programs. Identify key individuals for these programs and communicate the benefits and expectations.
  • Monitor progress on action plans, addressing any issues that arise promptly. Adjust the implementation strategy as needed based on feedback and results.
  • Write and send an employee engagement survey following complete roll-out; review results.

Collateral: Training implementation progress reports, communication materials for new programs, documentation of career advancement initiatives.
